title: WEHO GEM! Vintage Hollywood 1 Bed 1Bath in the Heart of West Hollywood
map_address: 1002 N Sweetzer near Santa Monica Blvd
posting_body: ['WEHO GEM!', 'Vintage Hollywood 1 Bed 1Bath in the Heart of West Hollywood!', 'Newly renovated 1928 Mediterranean-style courtyard building with lush foliage and a gorgeous fountain with live fish.', "Step through the gates and you're in a tranquil little oasis, yet right in the heart of the City of West Hollywood and near everything.", 'For more information or to schedule a viewing, please call the Property Manager, Tom', 'show contact info', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Bedrooms: 1 Bed', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Street Parking (plenty available)', 'Unit Floor/Level: 1st-Floor Unit', 'Lease Duration: 1 Year (See Details Below)', 'Deposit: 1 month (OAC)', 'Pets Policy: Cats & Dogs OK', 'Laundry: Shared', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'DESCRIPTION:', 'Living room with fresh paint, original hardwood floors, and base molding throughout, arched doorways, beautiful closet space with French doors and built-in shelving, wall heater on a digital thermostat, original casement windows, and beautiful light sconces on opposite walls.', 'Kitchen with beautiful tile flooring, new quartz countertops, brand new stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, over-the-range microwave, and gas stove/oven), new Shaker cabinetry, original built-in spice rack, and a window.', 'Kitchen has a separate entrance to easily access the building laundry facility located in the back drive area.', 'Bedroom with a new wall a/c unit, modern light fixture, large casement window ,USB port/outlet for convenient charging, and a spacious closet.', 'Bathroom with the original hex tile flooring, a pedestal sink with a built-in mirrored cabinet above, freshly glazed bathtub with subway tiled sides and tiled walls, an additional built-in upper cabinet, window, and all new accessories.', '**Please join us  Wednesday, August 3rd , 2022, at our open house from 5-7, Thank you**', 'For additional Ben Leeds Property listings go to <URL> or call our Leasing Agent', 'show contact info', '.', 'Pet Policy: Cat and Dogs friendly – under 25 lbs.', '(weight at maturity); No aggressive breeds: Chows, Pit Bulls, Dobermans, Rottweilers, German Shepard, and a mix of aggressive breeds.', 'Pet Rent and Deposit may apply.', 'Other Terms and Requirements:', '1-year lease term; Security deposit is determined by your credit, typically 1-month rent; Online Application is preferred and can be processed faster than a paper application; $30 Application fee per person (18 years and older) can be paid with credit or debit card for online application or with money order and cashier check for paper application;', 'No evictions; No foreclosures / bankruptcies in the last 5 years; Two (2) forms of current government issued ID: Driver’s License, Passport, SSN card, Military ID, Visa, etc; Proof of Income: last 3 months of check stub’s, or checking / saving account, or current W2.', 'Renter’s insurance is required.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity Provider', '*Pricing and availability is subject to change without notice*', 'Photos may vary from actual unit and are for representational purposes only and subject to variances.', 'Variances may include, but are not limited to, views and exposure to light, finishes for the final product, as well as layout and included features in the finished product.']
